short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group Jira feeds by issue - for Feeder.co

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you reading your Jira comments using Feeder?
It's quite convenient: it syncs across your computers, it notifies as soon as something happen, almost perfect.
If you're a power-jira-user however it's sometime frustrating to have the issues all over the place...
Wouldn't it be better to group the comments by issue?
Of course it would! This extension is here to save you!
